mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, D.DEP_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, P.POSITION_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN DEPT_RECORD DR ON(E.EMP_NO = DR.EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(DR.DEP_ID = D.DEP_ID) LEFT JOIN JOB_RECORD JR ON(E.EMP_NO = JR.EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN JOB J ON(J.JOB_CODE = JR.JOB_CODE) LEFT JOIN POSITION_RECORD PR ON(E.EMP_NO = PR.EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN POSITION P ON(P.POSITION_NO = PR.POSITION_NO) WHERE DEP_RECORD_DATE = (SELECT MAX(DEP_RECORD_DATE) FROM DEPT_RECORD R WHERE R.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) AND JOB_RECORD_DATE = (SELECT MAX(JOB_RECORD_DATE) FROM JOB_RECORD R WHERE R.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) AND POSITION_RECORD_DATE = (SELECT MAX(POSITION_RECORD_DATE) FROM POSITION_RECORD R WHERE R.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) AND DEP_NAME = #{depName} ORDER BY 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES(FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{originFileName}, #{changeName}, SYSDATE, NULL, #{docNo}, NULL, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT D.DOC_NO, DOC_TITLE, DOC_CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, EMP_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL_RECORD WHERE APPROVAL_STATUS = 'AP1' AND DOC_NO = D.DOC_NO) AS APP_STATUS FROM DOCAPPROVAL D JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(WRITER = EMP_NO) WHERE WRITER = #{empNo}
